caption: Great pizza, and I love this place.  Made me wear a mask when the store was empty.  Which felt a little odd and out of line with common sense.
Only good thing about this place is they had law and order svu playing on the tv but would’ve been better if they put subtitles on.
I work here
Food is delicious
Great pizza!!!
Wasn't busy perfect!!!
Our family loved the 🍕 and salad. Our waiter was great too and we wait long for our food.
I was told delivery in 45 minutes and it was a hour and 45 minutes later simi cold pizza I am not happy
Awesome pizza!  Chicago combo with extra sauce every time!

Coming here for years.. NOT anymore. Past few times, especially for lunch it's taken close to 25 minutes to get order. On top of that the premade salads are a joke, you pay for salad bar, and since covid you get this micro mini salad in a cup. Numerous times I've ordered a pizza and there was one or two slices that didn't have any toppings. Pretty much the whole pizza was Skimpy in toppings. One of the more expensive pizza places in Boise, to bad other places are taking your business, including mine. I've had  over 40 years that had to deal with the public daily, I was pretty blown over by your response. Basically your telling me and any one else that we should find somewhere else to go if we're unhappy.Every business will have screw ups, it's how you fix them will determine how long you'll be in business. All you said was I'm sorry and that isn't the Norm. That's fixing it ? You can only do this so long. Adios.
We ordered beers and a medium vegetarian pizza, thin crust. It was delicious! Beers were good. Service was excellent. Loved it here. Will be back.
Nice outside seating, pleasant staff, cold beer
Great, friendly service and awsome pizza!

The food at CC is GREAT! In my opinion, it's the BEST pizza in the Valley! Paisley was our Server this particular day, and she is a wonderful Server, seemed to really enjoy talking to us; very personable, works with a Smile on her Face! :)
Love this place! Great staff, good food and an awesome patio!

The positive comment I can truely say that the staff is very nice.  That being said, I want to say since I paid for the lunch yesterday, is how dissatisfied I was by my lunch.  We waited nearly a half hour for two (salad bar) salads and one personal pizza .   We ran out of lunch time and informed someone in the kitchen.   The price of the meal was the same as a salad bar size salad times two.  However when they brought our salads out, they came in a cup like container with greens, one small tomatoe, and one cucumber slice.  With a peperoni on the top.   I know in these difficult times we have all had to change and expect less.  But to pay more and receive less is really tacky on Chicago Connection s part. The cup container for the salad is about the size inside of a coffee mug.  It is the amount of a diner salad in a small bowl.  Either change the price or better the quality.  Very dissatisfied patron!
Pretty good

I have always enjoyed Chicago Connection.... However this particular place I will never go back to. I have been in and out of this location several times and have been extremely disappointed and will never go back. I have had them deliver my food to the wrong apartment and at the same time extremely slow! This time I waited 30 mins for a personal pizza and salad. I ended up having to take it to go. Dont expect to get your food on time at this place.
Great family restaurant.  Staff was awesome and friendly..
Cozy
Nice comfortable atmosphere, great pizza, great customer service, Sarah was a great server, I would like to return to the pizza place again for lunch in the next few days
Salad bar is always fresh and its a great place for lunch.

The menu options here are not very good. The pizza is bland, the pasta tastes cheap, and the salad bar always looks like a mess. Unfortunately it takes awhile for your food to arrive, and even then it doesn't taste very good. Convenient location, but you would be better going somewhere else.
Best pizza in town!

Considering pizza is one of their big selling points along with their massively tasty selection of brews, in my opinion much better pizza is less than a five minutes early from this downtown location.
Amazing pizza and deserts
Super nice people and tasty pizza🍕
Very dirty. Food was good staff could have cared less.
Amazing service and the pizza was outstanding!!!!
The server was great. Wonderful salad bar and of course great pizza.
Always great pizza. Personally, this is my favorite location. Friendly staff and always very clean. I reccomend coming here for dinner to anyone coming into town.
Good pizza go there alot
Service was awesome and the food was spectacular! Thank you!
Nice veggie pasta!
This is the BEST Chicago Connection we’ve ever been to! Yum! Great service! Thanks so much!
Not bad but poor service

Pizza is generally a hard one to reviewbut this place has amazing Pizza they have pasta they have an amazing lasagna Pizza definitely good place to try I think that it's better than old Chicago it's better than Idaho Pizza company definitely better than all the pizza whole shops I definitely recommend it the only downside to this place inn mini pizza places I find is they don't have full bar for my friends
Great food great service!
Really great pizza.
Kids had a great time on the padio

I work in a pretty large office downtown, so we regularly have employees order pizza from CC. The delivery driver today was so sweet and patient, and the pizza came within the hour (which can be a struggle downtown during the lunch rush).
Loved it! Deven was an amazing server!!
For 23 dollars got a large combo and had very little toppings on it, compared to flying pie or Idaho pizza gotta step your game up!
Best GF pizza in all of boise

My favorite pizza in Boise!  I've been coming here since the 80's and am rarely disappointed.  The service is always excellent while the staff is friendly and efficient. Not true Chicago style pizza but more of a hybrid of Chicago style thickness but with the cheese on top.
Awesome service!  I have been here before and disappointed by the service, but not this time!  Super friendly and helpful.  Food was perfect!
Great food
Food was the delicious pizza I've had so far in Boise. And the service was great!
Great  pizza, friendly staff, speedy delivery. You guys are the best!
I love their pizza.
After 10 years I had lunch at the downtown location. As always deep dish Chicago style as always it was great. The waitress was outstanding.
Marvelous Bacon Double Cheeseburger and excellent service
I love their extra cheesy deep dish, it's the best!
Great salad bar and pizza! Marvelous wait staff!
They were able to handle a get together of 15-20 people pretty well and the Buffalo Chicken pizza is amazing!
Dang good food! Friendly service too!
Yummy.  For a pizza place it has the best salad bar. 🤗

Salad bar has alot variety for a small area!  Fresh fresh fresh!!  We had the deep dish pepperoni pizza.  It was cheesy, gooey, delicious!!  Waiter was awesome!! Outdoor seating available.   My first time, will definately return.  Only downfall...to get to the place theres a few stairs to climb!!
Food was good but service could have been better.
The Best pizza in all of Boise. Hands Down!!!!
Good.
Great deep dish pizza
Very nice staff and simply delicious food! I have been a patron for years and will continue to be.
Nice to sit outside. Average pizza.
Damn Nice Restaurant, easy to get to, reasonable parking.
Great service
Great salad bar great service
Best pizza around
had a great time with two friends food was awesome our sever was on point nice little spot will be coming back this summer to check out the patio
My favorite.
Good food and ambiance.
Love the Cal Zone

I have been going here for 15 years and normally the food and service here is great. On on January 17 2019 we went there for lunch and the wait staff ignored us and overcharged us by $12.00 then proceed to argue with us about it. Horrible overall experience that day.
Our server today was rude and it took 40 mins to get our lunch.Our pizzas were way over cooked and we literally left after one slice.Dissapointing.
Great food

Love Chicago Connection.  Been to the nampa and meridian locations tons of times. Love the pizza and love love love the salad bar.  This was my first time at the downtown location, it was New Years Eve and my wife and I wanted to get a togo salad bar.  The letttuce was brown and starting to go runny in places, there were squashed rotten tomatoes in the cherry tomato section and the mushrooms were also brown and starting to go mushy.  I gave 3 stars because I love the chain but I wont be back to this location when I want a salad.

The pizza we ordered tonight was good but I was not impressed with the Chicken Dippers and wish I didn't get them. The description says, "seasoned, breaded, boneless breast meat with your choice of sauce."... Well yeah it's boneless because it's processed and comes from who knows how many chickens. When you tear one open it looks like ripping a sponge(similar to Mcnuggets). For how much the pizzas cost I didn't expect this low quality from other items on the menu.
Great service and French dip sandwich.

I ordered spaghetti and meatballs. Ot took 40 min and it was cold. The sauce was warm but meatballs and noodles were cold. So was the daughters chicken. They were going to make it again. 30 min later we decided to call it. The waitress never refillednpur drinks or even came to check on us. There was only 4 tables seated in the place.
Very good service, interesting interior, convenient location.  However, extremely pricey, and I didn't really enjoy the dough they used it their crust (oddly sweet and brittle).

Could not get threw on the phone. Drove to the store to order. I was told 15 min.40 min later got pizzas. There was two tables in the restaurant with costumes at them  the other tables were open. Thin crust was soggy. But still tasted good. I'm not sure if it's always like that but that was my first experience.

I decided to write this after getting a message from Chicago Connection asking what would improve my 4 star rating to a 5.  First of all, I will discuss the salad bar. Whoever thought of goldfish and tortilla strips on salad, I commend you. They are a wonderful. I would say it could be nice to have bowls instead of plates, but that's just a nit-picky personal preference.  Next is the pizza. It's great, always, but slightly different every time. It varies in sauce amount, crust thickness, how browned the crust is, etc. It is always great, but it is interesting to me. It makes me suspect that you are not only using multiple chef's, but also a less formulaic process. I would be interested to see the real reason.  You do have a quite enjoyable aesthetic and feel to the restaurants.  I, personally, base my ratings on not just food, but reliability. The staff are also really important, both how they treat me and how the company treats them.  I'm don't remember why I have it a 4, it should've been a 5.  -Cheers
Great food and I love their salad bar
Solid lunch special
Great food, needs more front of house staff!
Love the pizza love the salad bar prices have climbed in the last few years
Great service good food will come back again
Salad bar rocks
Food was meh...
Quick n friendly
Such a nice cozy little place. Pretty good food too.
Excellent place to eat, prices are reasonable, service is great and the food is outstanding.
This is a sleeper right next to downtown.  Never to crowded to get a table, cool building, nice patio, and excellent salad bar.

The salad bar at CC on 4th in Boise is the best in town. If the place was cleaned up, I would give it a 4-5 star rating. However, it's not clean. Parking can be difficult on the best day! Staff are courteous and efficient. Tables are sticky. Come on guys, spruce the place up!
Great food and great atmosphere!
Wonderful salad bar. Great variety of sandwiches and pasta. Good seating indoor and out. Plus pizza.
The best pizza I've had in Idaho. Very addictive!
Salad bar was not well maintained and the sausage was to spicy
7/5 best pizza

I agree with previous reviewer that the in-house salad bar is a little pricey for being so underwhelming, BUT that small snafu aside, we LOVE this location. We have ordered online/picked up and dined inside. Online orders easy and restaurant is quiet and peaceful. Both times were great experiences. The pizzas and wings are top notch. The local beers on tap and the service (Juan) are above excellent. This is our new, favorite go-to pizza place and we are happy. 😁
Awesome!
Ordered a pizza from here again tonight, and as always, it was DELICIOUS! Thank you all so much for the yummy pizza, I'm never disappointed! 🍕🍕🍕🍕🍕🍕🍕🍕

The pizza here was delicious! If you’re looking for a real Chicago style pizza this is the place for you! The only thing I didn’t like about this place was that they have a one trip salad bar that costs about four dollars. Good atmosphere and a cute patio!
Best pizza in Boise great salad bar
Not the cleanest place, I don't know what the kitchen looks like. I don't want to know.
Good food, quick friendly service.
Great all you can eat salad bar!
Good service good pizza
Very quiet and peaceful

Best gluten free pizza I have tried in Boise. A little pricey, but not too bad. The salad bar was also good; well stocked and fresh. Special thanks to our server (Star). She was a sweetheart and great at her job.
Quick service, lunch special was good, comfortable atmosphere.
LOVE LOVE LOVE the Lasagna Pie! Great salad bar and cheese bread. Reasonable prices, great service and relaxed atmosphere.
Mmmmmm need i say more
SO MUCH CHEESE! ♥
Thin crust is the best from them. Always good pizza!
Great pizza and great delivery.
Great food and service
Was feed a bunch of BS on why my order was screwed up!!
Expensive and extremely slow to non-existent service. Salad bar not very fresh.
Great service
Location, location, location, good pizza, good brews.

I don't know why it's named after Chicago. The pizza is decidedly NOT Chicago-styled. It's good pizza. And sandwiches that are good, and the salad bar is good. It's all-around a good place for lunch at least, and most likely supper, though I've never had supper there. But I don't really understand the "Chicago" bit.
Amazing pizza!
Great salad bar and flatbread!
Food was good. The lack of Wifi means we won't be back during business lunches....
Like the  environment. It is great
I love Chicago Connection pizza.  This location is great for a quiet weekend lunch.
My favorite pizza in Idaho! Been going there since they first opened.
Food is good, easy to park
Great pizza

I work a couple blocks away and come here for lunch on occasion. The food, service and prices are good. However the booth seat my wife and I were placed in was filthy. Stained cushion, crumbs all over it and the crevices. The restaurant seemed clean, just the seat was gross. I frequent another CC in Meridian for pizza deliveries which has always pleased me. I like CC.
One of the best Gluten Free pizzas I've ever had! Good service too.
Enjoy this location and their pizza is delicious!
Best salad bar

I ordered a pizza from the website at 11:58am and the estimated delivery time was 12:43pm. The pizza was not delivered until 1:10pm. I was only 0.5 mile away from the restaurant (Would have walked but too rainy outside). I am very disappointed in Chicago Connection..
Great food and interesting atmosphere. Love the old building!
Deep dish pizza with all its goodness. Nice lunch specials
Love the pizza here. Not a big Chicago style pizza fan (like Uno's)... This is much better IMO, the crust is not super thick and sweet.

Ordered a pizza from this location via their website. Specified a time for it to be delivered and made a special request for lots of peppers and Parmesan. The pizza showed up almost 40 minutes earlier than requested; no biggie. There were only two packages of Parmesan; no biggie. But when I opened the box, the pizza was a squished mess. The driver had already left, so I called the shop and explained the situation. The manager was helpful enough and sent a new pizza my way. When the same driver arrived, however, he couldn't have acted more annoyed. A sarcastic remark ("here's your OTHER pizza") AND he cut me off when I tried to say thank you with a curt "Yeah". No apologies for the inconvenience. No asking if there's anything else they can do to make it right. Just a lot of unnecessary attitude. Hey man, I'm not the one who squished this pizza. I'm out almost thirty bucks for this meal (including the tip I gave you), so I at least expect some courteous service and a pizza in the shape of a circle. To top it all off, both pizzas were only lukewarm when they arrived and hardly had any meat for an All Meat pizza. I will definitely not be ordering from this company again.
Best Pizza in Boise!
The food and pricing were fairly good. The pizza was a bit on the greasy side for my taste and service was a little slow. Not a bad meal though and I would go back.
I go here often, the only issue is sometimes service can be incredibly slow. Maybe about 10% of the time. Salad bar is great.

I ordered the chicago combo pizza with salad bar. The pizza was hot and crust was cooked perfectly. And..... Lots of cheese. So that was excellent. However when i got my bill there was a surprised. I asked when i ordered to substitute the olives for tomatoes. They did replace he olives with tomatoes but charged me the extra topping for the tomatoes. So other than being charged for an extra topping it was a good experience. I will come back to try the lasagna pie.
Wonderful location, quiet, typical pizza place, nice patio
Great food

I would give zero stars if that was an option. We ordered a pizza online for delivery. When I called 40 minutes later to inquire where our dinner was, I was informed that they were actually closed when the order was placed. I ordered at 9:17pm and the site said they were open until 10pm. My card was actually charged for the order as well. (Shouldn't the online ordering process inform me that the establishment was closed and not allow my card to be charged?). At the very least, they could have called me to tell me that the order was not coming, so we could make other dinner arrangements at a decent time, instead of at 10pm when we had to call them. Seriously pissed off at the lack of consideration for us and that I was charged and have to deal with a refund now. I will not order from Chicago Connection again and will definitely discourage anyone I know from supporting this unprofessional business.
Great pizza, cheese and crust is amazing.  expensive but will return.
Love this place: their lasagna pie is one of a kind (lasagna on a pizza crust). Good for catered events. They also have one of the better salad bars in town.
Pizza, wings, and salad bar were great. Thanks for the great service.
A really good place for lunch. Chicken Maui is a good sandwich here. Service can vary based on the person and day.

Expensive, yes. But VERY well-worth it all, given CC'S longtime reputation for exquisite flavor, freshness AND overall great quality pizza!!! Their other dishes/specialties also rock. Great stuff!!! ☆
Always the best!
Some of the best in Boise, and so friendly!
Great deep dish pizza and a fresh salad bar.  Prices are a bit high but the taste is definitely worth the money.  Staff is always happy to serve.
Very good ordered pizza to our hotel!
Lots and lots of cheese.
